home.heroSubtitle: We deliver London's freshest flowers and most special gifts to your door the same day.
home.notFound: No products found matching your criteria.

aboutUsPage.aboutTitle: About Us - Fesfu | Freshest Flowers and Gifts
aboutUsPage.aboutDescription: Discover the story, mission and values of Fesfu. We are dedicated to providing our customers with the highest quality flower and gift experience. We make a difference with fast delivery and excellent customer service.

homePage.homeTitle: Fresh Flowers and Special Gifts - Fesfu London
homePage.locationTitle: London - Freshest Flowers and Special Gifts | Fesfu
homePage.homeDescription: We deliver London's freshest flowers and special gifts to your door the same day. Discover perfect gift options for birthdays, anniversaries, marriage proposals and other special moments.

contactPage.contactDescription: Contact us for your questions, suggestions or complaints. At Fesfu, we are always happy to help. You can use different contact channels to reach us.

faqPage.faqDescription: Discover frequently asked questions about Fesfu. Learn about ordering, delivery, return policy and other important topics. Find quick and easy answers to your questions.

favouritesPage.title: My Favourites - Fesfu | Products You Like
favouritesPage.description: Save your favourites and easily access your favourite flowers, gifts and other products. With Fesfu, you can buy your favourite products with one click.

legalPage.title: Legal Information - Fesfu | Privacy Policy and Terms of Use
legalPage.description: Learn detailed information about Fesfu's privacy policy, terms of use and cookie policy. Learn how your personal data is protected and your rights when using our platform.

myOrdersPage.title: My Orders - Fesfu | Order Tracking and History
myOrdersPage.description: View your past orders, review order details and track the status of your orders. Easily manage all your orders with Fesfu.

registerCourierPage.title: Courier Application - Fesfu | Become a Courier
registerCourierPage.description: Join Fesfu's courier program and earn extra income with flexible working hours. Learn about the courier application process and apply now.

registerPage.title: Register - Fesfu | Create New Account
registerPage.description: Register with Fesfu and get access to the freshest flowers and special gifts. Start shopping now with a quick and easy registration process.

vendorRegistrationPage.title: Vendor Application - Fesfu | Open Your Store
vendorRegistrationPage.description: Open your store on the Fesfu platform and reach a wide customer base. Learn about the vendor application process and apply now.

contact.infoTest: We are here for your questions, suggestions or complaints.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.successSubMessage: We will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.errorMessage: An error occurred while sending the message. Please try again.

about.ourHistory: Founded in London in 2024, Fesfu UK set out to deliver the freshest flowers and most special gifts to your loved ones. Our aim is not just to deliver a product, but to help you express your feelings in the best way by shortening distances.
about.sameDayDeliverySub: For orders placed before 18:00 within London.
about.freshnessGuaranteeSub: The freshest flowers selected from the auction every morning.
about.whyChooseUsSub: We combine our global experience with local touches. We support local florists while providing corporate service quality. Our courier team delivers your flowers carefully, gently and with a smile.
about.comment: add information about couriers and shops later and update about us page

favorites.favoritesDescription: We keep your favourite products here.
favorites.favoritesEmpty: You haven't added any favourites yet.
favorites.favoritesEmptyDesc: You haven't added any products to your favourites list yet. How about discovering the freshest flowers and gifts?

forgotPassword.passwordForgottenDesc: Enter your email address and we'll send you a reset link.

privacyPolicy.firstDesc: As Fesfu UK, we attach maximum importance to the security of your personal data within the scope of the Personal Data Protection Law No. 6698 (KVKK) and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

secondDesc.part1: Identity and Contact: Your name, surname, email and phone number are processed for order confirmation and invoice transactions.
secondDesc.part2: Delivery Information: The recipient's address and contact information are shared with the Courier and the relevant Store (Vendor) for the purpose of delivering the order.
secondDesc.part3: Transaction Security: IP address and device information are stored for fraud detection and legal obligations.

privacyPolicy.thirdDesc: Your credit card information is never stored on our servers. Payment transactions are carried out directly by the global payment infrastructure Stripe via SSL certified encrypted connection.

termsOfUse.title: Distance Sales Agreement
termsOfUse.firstDesc: This agreement has been concluded between the BUYER who places an order through the platform and the SELLER (Store) who supplies the product, with the mediation of Fesfu UK.
termsOfUse.secondDesc: ATTENTION: According to the regulation; "In contracts for the delivery of goods that can spoil quickly or whose expiry date may pass" (Fresh Flowers, Chocolate, Cake, etc.) THE RIGHT OF WITHDRAWAL CANNOT BE USED.
termsOfUse.secondDesc_part2: However, if the product is damaged, wilted or completely different from the image at the time of delivery, the buyer can refuse delivery and request a return.
termsOfUse.thirdDesc: Orders are delivered on the date and time range selected by the buyer. The platform is responsible for delays except for force majeure (weather conditions, traffic accidents, etc.).

termsOfCookies.title: Cookie Policy
termsOfCookies.firstTermDesc: Cookies are small text files that are saved to your browser by the websites you visit and help us remember you. Some cookies are mandatory for our site to work.

secondTermDesc.firstDesc: They are necessary to remember the products in your cart, to log into your account and for payment security. These cannot be turned off.
secondTermDesc.secondDesc: They are used for your language preferences, address records and features like "Remember Me".
secondTermDesc.thirdDesc: They help us improve our service by anonymously analysing how you use our site (which pages you visit).

termsOfCookies.thirdTermDesc: You can delete or block cookies at any time from your browser's settings menu. However, blocking essential cookies may disrupt the functioning of cart and payment functions.

first.title: 1. INTRODUCTION AND PARTIES
first.desc: These Terms and Conditions govern the sale of goods made to you ("Buyer") by the Seller through the Platform. By placing an order, you agree to be bound by these terms under the Consumer Rights Act 2015.

second.title: 2. DELIVERY POLICY
second.desc: We aim to deliver products within the time slot selected at checkout. If the buyer is not at the address, due to the nature of perishable products (flowers/food), the courier may leave the package in a "safe place" or with a neighbour (UK standard practice).

third.title: 3. CANCELLATION AND RETURN POLICY
third.desc: Under the Consumer Contracts Regulations 2013, consumers generally have a 14-day right of withdrawal. HOWEVER: Perishable Product Exception: For goods that can spoil quickly or whose expiry date passes quickly (fresh flowers, plants, food products), there is <strong>NO RIGHT OF CANCELLATION/WITHDRAWAL. Under the Consumer Rights Act 2015, if products are not as described or are of insufficient quality at the time of delivery (e.g. crushed flowers), you have the right to a refund or exchange. You must notify us within 24 hours of delivery with photographic evidence.

fifth.title: 5. PRIVACY AND DATA PROTECTION
fifth.desc: Your personal data (Name, Address, Phone) is processed in full compliance with UK GDPR and Data Protection Act 2018. Data is shared only with the Seller and Courier for the purpose of completing your order.

first.title: 1. WORKING METHOD
first.desc: The Courier agrees to provide services as "Self-Employed", as an Independent Contractor. This agreement does not make the Courier an employee, worker or partner of the Platform. You are responsible for your own taxes and National Insurance (NI) payments.

second.title: 2. SERVICE STANDARDS
second.desc: The Courier must take utmost care to preserve the aesthetic integrity of perishable products (flowers, cakes). Deliveries must be completed within the specified time slots.

third.title: 3. DATA PROTECTION (GDPR - CRIMINAL OFFENCE)
third.desc: Customer data (address, phone) transmitted to you is ONLY for delivery purposes. Under the Data Protection Act 2018; recording this data, calling/texting the customer for reasons other than delivery, or sharing it with others is a CRIMINAL OFFENCE. If detected, the contract will be terminated and legal action will be initiated.

first.title: 1. PARTIES AND PURPOSE
first.desc: This Agreement is between the Platform and the Vendor (Supplier). The Vendor grants the Platform the right to list and sell its products. Legal ownership of the products remains with the Vendor until the sale is completed.

second.title: 2. COMMISSION AND PAYMENTS
second.desc: The Platform charges a commission of 10% + VAT on the gross value of each order. Payments are made weekly. The Platform reserves the right to withhold payment in case of suspicious transactions or high return rates.

third.title: 3. PRODUCT LIABILITY AND COMPLIANCE
third.desc: The Vendor guarantees that all goods sold comply with the Sale of Goods Act 1979 and (if selling food) UK Food Safety standards. The cost of returns due to poor quality products, incorrect packaging or image mismatch belongs to the Vendor.

fourth.title: 4. DATA PROTECTION (GDPR)
fourth.desc: The Vendor will process customer data in compliance with UK GDPR and Data Protection Act 2018. Data will only be used for the purpose of processing orders.
